public class TCPIn

A task that handles the incoming messages.

  • Method Details

    • run

      public void run()
      Indefinitely reads objects from the socket until an exception occurs. Detects ping messages and discards them, updating the lastTimestamp attribute.
      Specified by:
      run in interface java.lang.Runnable

    • receiveMessage

      public Message receiveMessage() throws java.io.IOException
      Function called to receive a message. It takes a message from the internal queue and returns it.
      Returns:
      the first message in the internal queue
      Throws:
      java.io.IOException - if interrupted or too much time has elapsed since the last Ping

    • close

      public void close() throws java.io.IOException
      Closes the connection.
      Throws:
      java.io.IOException - if the connection can't be closed.
